additional-notes: This is a British publication.  Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.

This magazine frequently reprinted stories that had originally appeared in other magazines.  We have not systematically checked the copyrights of those earlier publications. The first contribution renewal shown here is for the first contribution with an active CCE renewal record specifically mentioning this magazine.
